item.title: ODA in final week of 2025 summer sports camp
item.description: For multiple weeks, young kids from all over the Suncoast community have been coming out, being active, staying physically fit and making new friends.

item.title: BPD finds weapons during warrant search in Bradenton, man arrested
item.description: The arrest brings the total number of firearms taken off the streets by the CRT this year to 34.

item.title: Sarasota County $210 million hurricane relief grant approved
item.description: For homeowners, funds will be used for those who need help rebuilding and for homeowners who started building themselves and need reimbursed.

item.description: 'People know, they're just not talking,' Bradenton mom still searching for daughter missing over eight months.

item.title: The Suncoast returns to more typical summer weather

item.description: “When I was out there it wasn’t about myself, I was there representing everybody from Sarasota County”.

item.title: Community remembering Suncoast man killed abroad with vigil in Tampa
item.description: Sayfollah was known to be a happy, friendly young man with a wonderful spirit.
